active_projects.completion_summary: Fixed Himalaya UI toggle error by correcting function names and updated keybinding from <leader>mo to <leader>mm. Created compose-buffer-specific subgroup under <leader>mc for better organization.

artifacts.summary: Research report documenting existing himalaya multi-account configuration, neovim plugin architecture, and minor configuration gaps for Logos account
4-phase implementation plan for Himalaya multi-email configuration (Logos folder mappings, OAuth handling, testing, documentation)

active_projects.completion_summary: Configured Himalaya Neovim plugin for multi-email account support with Logos (Protonmail Bridge) alongside Gmail. Added folder mappings and password-auth detection to prevent OAuth errors for password-based accounts.
